headline: How CMS Energy's (CMS) Renewable Investment Plans and Regulatory Wins Could Shape Its Investor Appeal
summary: On November 14, 2025, CMS Energy's Board of Directors declared a dividend of $0.2625 per depositary share on its 4.200% Cumulative Redeemable Perpetual Preferred Stock, Series C, payable on January 15, 2026, to shareholders of record as of January 1, 2026. This comes as Consumers Energy announces plans to invest more than $13 billion in renewable energy and infrastructure upgrades by 2029, supported by continued coal operations and significant Michigan regulatory backing for clean energy...

headline: CMS Gains Momentum From Grid Modernization and Renewable Investments
summary: CMS Energy leans on regulated utility strength and major infrastructure and renewable investments, even as coal-ash costs pose challenges.
